mapper.select: SELECT cddpt ,cdupperdpt ,nmdpt ,nmshortdpt ,showodr ,dtavlst ,dtavled ,dtupdate FROM DPT ORDER BY showodr asc nulls last

SELECT rowno ,cddpt ,cdupperdpt ,nmdpt ,nmshortdpt ,showodr ,dtavlst ,dtavled ,dtupdate FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM() as rowno ,cddpt ,cdupperdpt ,nmdpt ,nmshortdpt ,showodr ,dtavlst ,dtavled ,dtupdate FROM DPT WHERE cddpt LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ESCAPE '~' OR cdupperdpt LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ESCAPE '~' OR nmdpt LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' ESCAPE '~' ORDER BY showodr asc nulls last ) WHERE rowno BETWEEN 1 AND 20
